meanings.definition: A book containing the biblical Psalms.
meanings.sent1: I found a dusty psalmbooks on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The church choir sang from the psalmbooks during the service.
meanings.sent3: The psalmbooks seemed to whisper ancient melodies as I opened it.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed like a chorus from the pages of the psalmbooks.
meanings.sent5: The worn cover of the psalmbooks held the history of many voices.

meanings.definition: A collection of sacred songs or hymns.
meanings.sent1: The psalmbooks were passed down through generations in our family.
meanings.sent2: The congregation sang joyfully from the psalmbooks.
meanings.sent3: The birds outside seemed to chirp in harmony with the psalmbooks.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a psalmbooks, full of melodies waiting to be sung.
meanings.sent5: The melodies in the psalmbooks lifted spirits and soothed souls.
